name: typescriptdemo
description: Toy project to create a default configuration for woring with TypeScript, ESLint, Mocha and Chai in the same NodeJS project

scripts.start-in-container: env $(echo LOCAL_ENV=1; cat .env) node -r source-map-support/register build/main.js
scripts.test-in-container: env $(echo LOCAL_ENV=1; cat .env) mocha --require source-map-support/register build/test
scripts.start: sudo docker run -it --rm --user "$(id -u):$(id -g)" --mount type=bind,src="$(pwd)",dst=/home "${npm_package_config_container_tag}" yarn start-in-container
scripts.test: sudo docker run -it --rm --user "$(id -u):$(id -g)" --mount type=bind,src="$(pwd)",dst=/home "${npm_package_config_container_tag}" yarn test-in-container

author: Sylvain Leroux
